item.title: Install Nginx, PHP-FPM on Linux Mint 19
item.description: Install Nginx Download the Nginx signing key from the official site, and the add the signning key into system. 1 2 $ wget http://nginx.org/keys/nginx_signing.key $ cat nginx_signing.key | sudo apt-key add - Add Nginx repository to the system using the below commands. 1 2 3 $ echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://nginx.org/packages/ubuntu/ bionic nginx" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nginx.list $ echo "deb-src [arch=amd64] http://nginx.org/packages/ubuntu/ bionic nginx" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.
